books.name: The Catcher in the Rye
books.description: The story of a teenage boy named Holden Caulfield who has been expelled from prep school.
books.author: J.D. Salinger

books.name: To Kill a Mockingbird
books.description: The story takes place in Alabama in the 1930s, and is narrated by the main character, a little girl named Scout Finch.
books.author: Harper Lee

books.description: A dystopian novel set in a totalitarian society.
books.author: George Orwell

books.name: Pride and Prejudice
books.description: A classic novel about the relationships between the Bennet sisters and their suitors.
books.author: Jane Austen

books.name: The Great Gatsby
books.description: The story of Jay Gatsby, a self-made millionaire, and his pursuit of Daisy Buchanan, a wealthy young woman whom he loved in his youth.
books.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
